string.value: #b#p2092001##k of #b#m251000000##k seems to be concerned about something...

#p2092001# seemed concerned about the fact that the #o4230505#s prepared to place herbs in have instead been inhabited by an unknown creature, causing havoc around the area. He asked me to eliminate #r400 #o4230505#s#k for him.\n\n#o4230505# #r#a38341##k
After defeating 400 #o4230505#s, #p2092001# seemed very pleased. I still havce no idea, however, what exactly was inside it...
Are you a traveler? If you didn't follow the passage, then... you may have gotten here through #m250000000#. Have you noticed something strange lately?\r\n#L0# #b Something strange?

Something strange, as in a supposedly-stoice #o4230505# walking around, attcking humans. #m251000000# is a heaven for #o4230505# to store medicines there, but one day, #o4230505# started really walking and causing havoc. \r\n#L0# #b What... there's a ghost in #o4230505#?

No, it' s not a ghost. It's just some random big creature inside #o4230505#, controlling its every move. I have no idea what that is, but the residents here are really going through trouble for this. If you can, can you please help us fight #o4230505#?

Thank you so much. I want you to eliminate as much #r#o4230505##k as possible... around #r400#k. Since no one knows exactly what it is, everyone's still scared to walk around the streets. Be careful. Good luck.
It's not a ghost, so you won't have to worry about that.
You managed to defeat all 400 #o4230505#s on time. Thank you so much! We can always get an empty #o4230505#, but no one should ever be hurt by it. Thank you again.
I don't think you have defeated #r400 #o4230505#s#k, yet...
